data.title: Chris Penn Tours Tiny Homes and Goes Off-Grid with Battle Born Batteries
data.meta_description: Read more about Chris Penn of the Off-Grid Skoolie and how he uses Battle Born Batteries to power his school bus builds large and small!
data.text:
Entrepreneur and digital nomad Chris Penn hit the road more than a decade ago and never looked back. Currently living in a school bus, or skoolie renovated to his needs, Chris now helps others live their dreams of being digital nomads. You can often find him getting his hands dirty while renovating school buses into livable tiny homes on wheels. With Battle Born Batteries powering his Bluebird bus, Chris no longer has battery [â€¦]

The post Chris Penn Tours Tiny Homes and Goes Off-Grid with Battle Born Batteries appeared first on Battle Born Batteries.
